Trigger.name: Blast
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == "you" then system.hunting.vars.targetName = matches[3] system.hunting.vars.attacking = true end
if system.hunting.funcs.isHuntingTarget(matches[3]) then system.hunting.funcs.razeShield() end

regexCodeList.string: ^With a roar of triumph, (\w+) unleashes a cataclysm of crushing psi energy at (.+)\.$
^With a roar of triumph, (\w+) unleash a cataclysm of crushing psi energy, laying waste to (.+)'s mind\.$
